invalid_directory_path = 'invalid_directory_path'
valid_dummy_directory = resource_filename('EmoPy',
    'tests/unittests/resources/dummy_data_directory')
empty_dummy_directory = resource_filename('EmoPy',
    'tests/unittests/resources/dummy_empty_data_directory')
channels = 1
with self.assertRaises(NotADirectoryError):
    DirectoryDataLoader(datapath=invalid_directory_path)
data_loader = DirectoryDataLoader(datapath=empty_dummy_directory)
with self.assertRaises(AssertionError):
    data_loader.load_data()
